statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication_data;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication_data WHERE last_login > '2021-10-01';
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM user_authentication_data ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_data WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_authentication_data WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users, MAX(user_id) AS max_id FROM user_authentication_data;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM user_authentication_data WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY last_access DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, s.session_token FROM users u INNER JOIN sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE last_access < '2022-02-01 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM user_sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, session_token, expiration_timestamp FROM user_sessions WHERE expiration_timestamp > NOW();
SELECT * FROM password_reset WHERE reset_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE expiration_timestamp > NOW() ORDER BY expiration_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(reset_timestamp) AS latest_reset FROM password_reset GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email='example@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;

SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id;
SELECT user_id, session_token, created_at FROM user_sessions WHERE session_id='12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id < 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
